For channels that have not started playing

Edit Channel Details
  1. Click .
  2. Edit the details you want to change and click Update Channel.
  3. Select one, and click Delete to remove them from your account
  4. Select an ad configuration, and click Duplicate to create an ad configuration copy
  5. Enter a name (English only, no spaces; these special characters are allowed: _ . : / = + -).
  6. If you toggle Loop Cloud Playout Loop Cloud Playout on, you may also enter an optional End Date/Time.
  7. Toggle Enable Server-Side Ad Insertion (SSAI) or you can Export on to enable SSAI - it will also remove the Live Input option.
  8. Click Add Videos.
  9. You can drag live events to reorder the list. You can also use the Quick Edit button to modify the duration of a live event.
  10. Expand New Profile.
  11. To confirm, click Delete Profile.
  12. To delete, click Delete.
  13. Click Delete and forget.
